summary: Add Widowmaker to your game as a standalone follower! CBBE/UUNP HDT BBP.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=orange][size=5][b]Please don't forget to [/b][u][b]ENDORSE[/b][/u][b] if you enjoyed this follower![/b][/size][/color]

This is a follower I created based on the wonderful Racemenu preset by Wasyash (found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81879]here[/url]). I thought it was too good for me not to make a standalone follower out of, so here she is. She is available in custom CBBE and UUNP with HDT breast and butt physics. If you don't want the physics you can download the no-armour version. Enjoy!

[size=5][color=pink][b]Features:[/b][/color][/size]

[size=2]HDT breast and butt + HDT High Heels Armour
Custom CBBE and HDT bodies
Non-HDT version available (no armour)
Ranger combat style
3 armour variants (rose, pink, and dark blue)
Custom makeup, eyebrow, hair and eye textures
KS Hairdo
4K and 2K textures
Marriageable
[/size][size=2]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/NBodql0.png?1[/img]

[/size][size=5][color=green][b]INFO:[/b][/color][/size]

[size=2]Race: Widowmaker Custom Race[/size]
[size=2]Location: Sleeping Giant Inn[/size]
[size=2]Weapons: Daedric Bow, Dual Daedric Sword[/size]
Armour: Widowmaker Light Armour (HDT)
Body Type: CBBE and UUNP (HDT & non-HDT)
Hair: Sweet Villain (KS Hairdos)
Voice: Female condescending
Weight: 100%
Combat Style: Ranger
Levels with player, minimum level 20
Essential

[img]http://imgur.com/o5vpAhR.png?1[/img]

[size=5][color=red][b]Requirements:[/b][/color][/size]

[size=4]Armour version:[/size]

[size=2]TBPP/BBP compatible skeleton (e.g. [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url][size=2])[/size]
[size=2]HDT Physics Extension ([/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]here[/url][size=2])[/size]
[size=2]HDT High Heels System ([/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]here[/url][size=2])[/size]

[size=4]Non-armour, non-HDT version:[/size]

[size=3][u]No requirements[/u][/size]

[size=2]If you want the pink or dark blue versions, install the main mod first and then download the patch from the optional files section. Make sure to load the patch AFTER the main mod in order to see the change.[/size]

[img]http://imgur.com/RbTYeXx.png?1[/img]
[img]http://imgur.com/UJ8Sdku.png?1[/img]

[size=5]Credits:[/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81879]Racemenu preset[/url][size=2] by Wasyash[/size]
[size=2]Outfit by gutris1[/size]
[size=2]Helmet by Xuniana ([/size][url=http://xuniana.tumblr.com/]tumblr[/url][size=2])[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79622/?]The Witcher 3 Eyes[/url][size=2] by Oaristys[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425/?]Real Girls Realstic Body Texture for UNP UNPB and SeveNBase[/url][size=2] by Zonzai and Seren4XX[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55761/?]Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for CBBE[/url][size=2] by drunkenmojo[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion[/url][size=2] by HHaleyy[/size]
[size=2]SG Female Textures and More by HelloSanta[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url][size=2] by Hello Santa[/size]
[size=2]Skin textures from [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38326/?]Seranaholic[/url][size=2] by rxkx22[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Bodyslide[/url][size=2] and [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE[/url][size=2] by Caliente[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP[/url][size=2] by dimon99[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos[/url][size=2] and [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50302/?]Better Females Eyebrows - Standalone[/url][size=2] by Kalilies[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url][size=2] by expired6978[/size]
[size=2]Bethesda[/size][/center]
author: DjVincent
